term.title: charring

item.text: Pyrolysis of samples containing organic matter. In the presence of oxygen this is referred to as ashing.

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 253. 'Nomenclature, symbols, units and their usage in spectrochemical analysis - XII. Terms related to electrothermal atomization (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 256 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264020253)
